00058 typedef enum TractionBoundaryConditionType_
00059 {
00060     NO_TRACTIONS,
00061     ELEMENTWISE_TRACTION,
00062     FUNCTIONAL_TRACTION,

00064     FUNCTIONAL_PRESSURE_ON_DEFORMED
